post.body: 90% of the way there! ouchie. ouchie. ouchie.
ahh for fucks sake. :P
I want you to try and come to Paris too! Come to @tpotratz and I's next brainstorm session. Lots of good ideas floating about..
yeah every month we pick at least one and run it with credits in the magazine. tired of pickin my own. *wink*
The dates for SXSW are 13th-22nd I think. When does Paris Fashion Week end? Goin from one to the other is gonna be culture shock!
check out http://vancouver.freebase.com. wanna add fearless and w2 to the database? jim pick has been doin' some wicked stuff..
hahaha raul... when you chain me you and barefoot together like that... it somehow evokes dirty thoughts. ;)
i like pie. peach pie. cherry pie. mostly any kinda pie!
you're good to go. see ya tomorrow. been to long! ps. you & @jennmae should make sure ya submit speaker things for nothern voice. :)
wanna be on my SXSW interactive panel about doing business in china? can you get yoself to texas in march?
methinks you'll dig this music video about men obsessed with Asian girls: http://bit.ly/izjg
wanna grab some vietnamese food on our way? starving...
yeah, i'm seriously near my maximum fun threshold. feel like i've been given a disproportionate share of awesomeness. ;)
lol. oh. sounds smart! ;) send me a link yo. ps. yer bald head is c00t!
you should register the twitter handle @sarahpullman as well... since i often misdirect tweets there. ;)
comin up to vancouver this weekend? i miss yer sweet face! http://flickr.com/photos/briansolis/2873069200/
sittin' here with @spencetress who said i should read your essay on semantic transfererence. pls send 'er along! :)
tonight i'm hitting up my agents xmas party & gonna catch elliot brood & alex cuba @ transmission in gastown. track me down
can you introduce me to @therealbritney? i've got somethin i wanna give her...
as if you'd want to. thou doth protest too much young potter. ;)
i know it. @scales and i have been having trouble with the whole omnipresence thing lately. totes re: tonight. i'll come over.
i'm not talking to @nalei right now. after waiting for her at the alibli room she pulled houdini after transmission shows. ;)
in the ass!
ok. time for us to be real friends. i'm starving and about to walk down water street. wanna meetup? :p
awwww... i love yer mom. she can come bake cookies at my birthday party on sunday too! :)
can i get a PDFof the halloween issue of ION Magazine. can't find it online and need a screengrab for portoflio. thx! :)
sounds great brother. get back to me when you know more. our panel would be during interactive.
you tinkered much with Google Friend Connect? i think i'd like to add that to my site too. seems easy! :) http://bit.ly/Yti4
i've been inviting a few peeps over to yer place to make xmas cookies for my birthday on the 14th fyi.
how do you find mint stats compares to google analytics?
would love get Mint added too as part of the updades you're doin' for me pls.
totally wanna hear it. inspired by my tweets last week? do tell!
yo dave @christinelu has agreed to be in Texas for the Doin' Bness in China panel we're pulling together for SXSW Interactive.
sorry yer feeling crappy. want me to change the music? :p or better yet you can play DJ...
any chance you could make it for SXSW to be on the business in china panel i'm putting together?
"whats your favorite number? what does it mean?" this album is trippin me out! "every number has a meaning!" ;)
booo... i tried to publish it to the open web. *goes back to the drawing board*
our good buddy @bmann is leadin' up the sponsorships effort for nothern voice 2009.
that's kinda cool, tho prolly not super usefull. i did one too to reserve my namespace:http://krunchd.com/kk
lemme know if we can collab on some photography for your topman article. ps. have a blog post about ya (kind) forthcomin ;)
following all three of ya already punk. :)
yeah, you rock. good job pulling it together. everyone is buzzin' about the gala tomorrow. should be a xmas party fueled geekout!
workin' on my artist CV for your funding proposal. and 10,000 other things. hope to have it to you by the end of the day!
yer such a tease! i wish i was goin' to the pop!tech gatherin in NYC next week but alas i will be here in YVR holdin it down.
dude, i'm so fuckin' happy for you. partner architech, enterprise and government identity ftw! maybe i'll join ya eventually.... ;)
now following and lemme say... zomg yer ziplining video is rad. i totally wanna go. crazy mofo.
how can you prioritize peeps in tweetdeck? that sounds like a pretty awesome feature! tweetdeck makes twitter useful for me.
situation rectified. an oversight i assure you! :)
awesome. now following. pls give gregory an awkwardly long hug today and when he's like WTF? tell him it was from me. thx! :)
damn that i missed you last night. sorry. i think that card will read on this camera. i hope. would love to rendevous & get it
we wouldn't need to be bored to rope you into our hijinks. don't wanna dissappoint, but i was in bed by 11.
awww.... thx pj. how you been? can't wait to see ya again! i assume you'll be at the nerd party tomorrow night? :p
tap defense kicks a whole lotta ass. :p what's yer high score? :p
i love shooting bands. let's talk about it. i think i can do it next weekend. :)
oh i forgot about that! excited tho. i think there is a lot of last night that is still comin back to me. *blush*
i owe a lot of friends from PopTech photos and will try to get on that this weekend! :)
yeah, you'll have to nurse me back to health tomorrow night at the best of Vancouver awards. save us a table for lots! ;)
i'm stoked to have you doin me finally and hope they turn out half as fresh as all those famous peeps you take photographs of!
tell the boy the show was off the hook, loved his dress, and can't wait til you take my blonde photos... maybe using my lights
just getting in from a crazy night of xmas parties w/ @fionagarden, & @gracegallery, & @dutchphoto (!). good music & peeps.
looks like i didn't score any tix f/ the Vancouver 2010 lottery & will be forced to buy them f/ @scales & @digitalkvan. $$$
sorry i got a lil distracted with fluvog. tell me the rest of the story tomorrow. g'night!
my buddy @scales and @digitalkvan both got some olympics tickets in the lottery. i'm headed to the bank to check mine now.
true, we rely pretty heavily on google too. it hurts when it fails but the alternatives are pricey & painful. consider it a snowday.
love the stuff you're doin' with the Vancouver Freebase site and your expiraments with distributed social networks.
comin to town? w00t! let's hang. lemme know yer plans! :)
Jules Moore gave me the Brixton hat She works there. I can look into it for you if you want a 'Stroll'.
now following. love the remixes you did of holynde. so very beautiful. been getting great feedback.
i thought maybe i already did by makin it a lil funny :p no seriously tho, i don't give a fuck if you do or not. it's a joke!
the cookie makin' celebration was like a dream come true. or maybe more accurately a fantasy. :P check my fbook pics. *giggle*
had such a rad birthday. so fun! thx for the love... :)
that's the dirtiest thing anyone has said to me in hours! ;)
sorry we missed our call last week. i was prolly drunk. ;) i'd love to reschedule if you have some time this week.
d00d thx so much for the flowers. tulips right? i really love to ones that fad from orange at the bottom to yellow on the tips.
now following. thx for the NY fashion week tips.
feels like everyday and i love it. thx for sushi and vino and i'll try not to run away so quickly next time...
oh. *blush* sorry. as long as the check clears you can call yourself whatever you like. ;)
welcome to the internets faux-kk. now following you. stay tuned for more photos... ;)
we're at 1 alexander for an hour uploadin' photos and stuff from our Fearless City phone donation collection. where you at?
we're collecting phones til January 9th - and chargers, peripherals, cameras, anything you can use to tell stories online. :)
Your cause, W2 Community Media Arts , has reached 100 members and earned a new pixel crowd: Club. on Facebook. Ha!
have any phones you can kick down for this donation drive? i wanna come by and give you beer and squishes. miss yer face.
yay... phones? treats? hugs? mmmmmmm. yes! what time ya gonna be by? the elves will be vewy happy to see you. :)
w00t. gonna the phone at the office? we can come pick it up and say hi. what time is a good buy to stop by?
@quikness you guys got any phones to donate? wanna make you a stop on our trip! ps. tell M-E-L i want my charger back beeeyatch :)
awesome tris. we'll come pick up your blackberry and give you winter ale in its stead. bradley gonna be around?
Headin' to the Biltmore to see Ladyhawk at the kickoff of Transmission 2008.
I look like Storm from Xmen and Trent Reznor's love child.
Ok we've gone from tingle to "zomg my scalp just got stung by a mutha fuckin jellyfish". Malissa has offered to pee on it but I remain u ...
My scalp is starting to tingle.... Malissa said that's normal and that it's gonna get worse before it gets better.
Irwin brought his daughter to the office and within the first minute both @scales and I had dropped an f-bomb. Damnit. Need to clean it up.
Designers announced for the next season of Project Runway Canada. Got a couple friends on the show. Go Kim & Christie! http://bit.ly/45zL
working on a redesign of KrisKrug.com w/ @duanestorey & @dalemugford of BraveNewCode.com. tryin to follow my own 'web of streams' advice.
anyone goin' up to Whistler today? Fearless City needs some mobile devices deliver to the Film Festival today. can give you a free pass...
Did you know that at ION Magazine we have a Flickr photo pool where we pull images for use in the print issue each month? http://bit.ly/9mY2
pullin' our SXSW plans together: @scales just payed for our booth, we booked the Hillary Clinton suite, & the Iron Cactus for Throwdown v.4.
Future of the internet? Next Wikipedia? Check out FreeBase. Here's the Vancouver FreeBase: http://vancouver.freebase.com
Transmission turned the Storyeum into the sickest live music venue I've seen in Vancouver. Reminisent of Red Bull House @ SXSW.
Want to buy: used/vintage alligator boots.
Don't ink your skin like everyone else, ink your heart and let every heartbeat wear your loved one's name.
Too weird to live, too rare to die.
doin' a 60 question interview for @scout_mag.
møtlëykrüg: http://bit.ly/M8x5
blonde kk: http://tinyurl.com/5w7a2v
Hastings street closed. Black Mountain rocking. Bedouin Soundclash up next. With @fionagarden and looking for @uncleweed.
my buddy @scales is lookin for an intern/student who wants to help him w/ some photo and blogging related tasks... & coffee and dog walks ;)
now following @gracegallery on Twitter. welcome to the internets Rachey. room for 1 at your table tonight? bout to die of starvation....
here's the Raincity contenders for best of Vancouver blog awards. hook a bruddah up! ;) http://bit.ly/Hd1F
oops bad URL on the "Rock & Roll Photography" proposal. take 2! http://tinyurl.com/5qh73t thx @ianivs & @tyleringram!
here's a link to the draft of the "Rock & Roll Photography" talk Bev Davies and I are gonna submit to Northern Voice http://bit.ly/Kvga
lookin up recipes for Glühwein to make @ @fionagarden's place on Sunday night for our lil xmas cookie baking thingy. mMm. http://bit.ly/Qvri
My buddy @dick joined Microsoft and is movin' to Seattle. Congrats bro. Can I house-sit yer loft? :p http://blame.ca/?p=187
who am I not following on Twitter that I should be? it can be pretty hard to keep up!
Dear Canada - "Governing a large country is like frying a small fish. You spoil it with too much poking." Tao Te Ching
headin' to the Wired Woman Gaming Industry xmas party thingy w/ @scales. if you don't hear from us for 3 hours.... call the police! ;)
tonights xmas party playlist includes: Kanye, ABBA, The Killers, Sir Mix-A-Lot, Nirvana, Toto, Beastie Boys, Madona, M.I.A., and David Bowie
if yer in Gastown, pop by Raincity... we're havin' a lil Xmas party. i'm leavin' at 6pm to head to the BestOf604 thingy.
i'm gettin' pretty excited about hanging out with all the nerdlings tonight at the Vancouver blogger awards gala.
helping @scales setup the new foosball table we bought the studio for Xmas.
secret Santa shopping for the Raincity Studios Christmas party today at 4pm.
over and out from RCS HQ YVR from @kk and @scales. too many pies, not enough fingers. make me a cyborg right now pls. <3
At the Biltmore catchin some ex-Skinny Puppy band and Fake Shark Real Zombie thx to @madmannequin and @gracegallery
Hangin @ the BOB Xmas party. The organ music is brutal, & the appy trays are from Super Store, but John Fluvog is funny & has befriended me
renowned artist & designer Roxana Brongo remixed several of my fashion photographs of Holynde into these cool images: http://bit.ly/iBgL
hangin' at the studio with Jer & Johnny Crowle. tryin' to convince them that man cannot leave on beer alone and that we should go eat food.
I'd love to get an invite to RedAnyWay.com. @bmann @jimpick can ya hook a bruddah up?
PolaDroid is making me feel better about no more Polaroid film. Awesomesauce >> http://flickr.com/photos/kk/3112090916/
Scarlett Johansson isn’t anything special. Don’t let her and her peers distract you from the beauty of your own sphere.
vote for me in this internet geek self-congratulatory wankfest: http://bit.ly/4rb6mV
Because nine lives are simply not enough.
I am ten thousand years old.
survived birthday weekend. so much fun & love. now back to da slave ship. lotsa catchin up to do. cool consulting gig this week w Tribal DDB
Just overheard.... "my god thats a big schwenis!"
"software is a really really long and really really precise incantation" -- dorian talyor
brrrrrrrrr.... at RCS HQ regrouping before headin back out to Tribal DDB to pick up a bunch of phones from @jameschutter and @apblog.
Santas lil helpers are hungry! Parada en La Casita por cerveza y tequilla y carnitas y ceviche. Felix navidad amigos!
This just in @eatcomm has a bag of phones for Fearless City donation drive at Tinseltown. On our way kids!!!
Bootup Labs gave us coal in our stocking. We aspirationally gave them Winter Ale anyway and hope the catch the xXXmas spirit. ;)
Posse roll ahead.... Off to Bootup Labs. Need more beer. Thirsty elves.
headin' to m2o media with the Fearless City phone donation posse to pick up phones and spread xXxmas cheer. :)
big ups 2 @spencetress who just got accepted to University of East London 2 do a PhD lookin @ the emotional & spiritual aspects of new media
ok... who wants santas lil helpers, @dutchphoto & @uncleweed & friends, to come by today and pick up yer old phones and give you pressies?
